content:
[1 ]As Holmes explained to Watson when he uncovered the chain of deductions (each link so simple) that allowed him to produce a thrust of `magical' insight

2 Proust, (1989: 1301, fn.1 to p.580).

3 We are referring to Latour, 1993 and 1996 in seeing knowledge production and political work as twin outcomes of a single set of processes.

4 We are borrowing this phrase from Hacking, 1995.
